text:
="preserve">Tweed New Haven Regional Airport, formerly known as Tweed-New Haven Airport, is a public airport southeast of the central business district of New Haven, Connecticut, United States. Tweed New Haven Regional Airport is currently owned by the City of New Haven. The airport property is in New Haven and the town of East Haven.
American Eagle provides daily non-stop service to Philadelphia, PA and weekly non-stop service to Charlotte, NC.
